metadata.description:
It begins with a death that sets off a chain reaction throughout the entirety of the DC Universe--and beyond! Featuring a rotating team of writers and artists including Paul Dini, Jimmy Palmiotti, Justin Gray and more! The Countdown to the FINAL CRISIS begins here!

Note: the issues of Countdown will be a countdown, going from 51 to 1.
metadata.name: Countdown to Final Crisis
